headline: Oil Traders Flock to Niche Options Market to Bet on Glut
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Investors have ramped up wagers in a relatively obscure corner of the oil market that OPEC+ output hikes will lead to an eventual glut toward the end of this year and into 2026. headline: 3 Crypto-Centric Stocks in Focus on the Ongoing Bitcoin Rally
summary: Crypto stocks V, PYPL and CME are gaining traction as Bitcoin stays strong above $100K and rate cut hopes grow.
